item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:30 on Wednesday night, so let's meet by 7:00 right outside the theater doors (or right inside if it's raining).

After the movie, we'll head to TGI Fridays with whoever wants to go.

Lesley has also asked if anyone wants to go out to dinner BEFORE the movie (like, meet at 5:30 or 6:00?). So if you'd like to do that, just put a comment in your RSVP that you're game and Lesley will contact you with details.

Hope to see you Wednesday!

--Dana



OLD STUFF:
Who doesn't like Sandra Bullock or Ryan Reynolds? Well, they're teaming up in a cute romantic comedy called The Proposal. Let's go see it together.

SUMMARY:
Book editor Maggie is everyone's worst nightmare: ruthless, selfish, driven, and tactless. But when a problem with her Visa could potentially send her back to Canada and destroy her all-important career, she comes up with a solution on the spur of the moment: marry her much younger (but all-American) assistant. Unfortunately, the government is understandably suspicious, and so the two faux lovers must embark on a humiliating charade in order to make the marriage seem legitimate.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet outside the theater doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays (I'll bring the coupons!) to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update this meetup with a specific time a few days before, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for The Proposal!

--Dana
item.name: The Proposal
